problems_addressed.solution_summary: Regularly update clients even when there's no new activity to report.

episode_summary: In this episode, Cathy LaMon shares her journey from IBM sales to becoming a top-producing real estate agent by building a referral-based business. She emphasizes the importance of effective communication, networking with trusted advisors, and hosting client appreciation events. Cathy also provides insights on adapting to market changes and leveraging social media to provide value.
